        Parameters:
        defaultIdPrefix - XML ID prefix (must not start with a digit; see XML schema documentation for detailed rules).

        public void registerId(Id id,
                       Id oldIdToUnregister)
                throws IdRegister.InvalidIdException
        Description copied from interface: IdRegister
        Registers the specified ID and unregisters an old ID at the same time. The old ID is unregistered only if the new ID is not in use already.
        Specified by:
        registerId in interface IdRegister
        Parameters:
        id - ID object to register
        oldIdToUnregister - ID object to unregister
        Throws:
        IdRegister.InvalidIdException - The specified ID already is in use.

      • registerOrCreateNewId

        public Id registerOrCreateNewId(java.lang.String id)
                         throws IdRegister.InvalidIdException
        Description copied from interface: IdRegister
        Tries to register the specified ID. If successful, the ID is returned, otherwise a new ID with default prefix is created and returned.
        Specified by:
        registerOrCreateNewId in interface IdRegister
        Parameters:
        id - ID object to register
        Returns:
        The registered ID or a new ID if the specified ID is in use already.
        Throws:
        IdRegister.InvalidIdException
